attributes.action: A second EU referendum once the details of our deal for leaving are agreed.
attributes.additional_details:
We believe the deal secured for our exit will need to include free movement of labour, fees payable to the EU and compliance to EU regulations and now 350m per week windfall for the NHS.

Once these foundational promises of Brexit are shown to be lies by the new agreement, the British public should get the chance to reconsider our decision to leave.
attributes.background: Nigel and Boris told us to jump off a cliff and we did it. They must now secure a new deal with the EU for our future and offer this to the British public. We demand a confirmation referendum once the truth of the Brexit future is made clear.
